tracks.text: Red light rolls right over humans. Green light rolls left over player characters. Rakuro and Sunraku, Towa and Pencilgon, Kei and Katzo, Rei and Psyger-0.
A green tower stands behind a fountain in the middle of a red-bricked town. Day turns to night. Red text, Shangri-La Frontier.
Sunraku stands in the Inventoria
Pencilgon and Katzo stand back to back
A mail bird lands on Psyger-0's arm.
A ninja runs at night.
Professor in library
Psyger-100 in town
Emul runs from SF Zoo
Bilac hammers in a forge. Amariys sips coffee. A woman and man stand on a roof near satellite dishes.
A computer sits in the Utopia reference room.
Sunraku flies through the crystal nest fighting scorpions.
Sunraku flies through the Ruins, fighting golems.
A mecha stares up. Blue and red mecha fly around and fight. The pink haired woman is in the red mecha.
A spiky golem in the ruins.
A white golem with an extra set of arms.
A lava crystal scorpion
A blue haired ninja girl makes hand signals.
Sunraku stares up at agiant mountain of metal trash.
Pencilgon swings a golden spear.
Katzo red fist punches the white golem.
Psyger-0 holds a sword and takes her dark form.
Sunraku wears a mask and holds crystal arm guns.
Clouds cover the moon.
A shadowy wolf lunges from the darkness.
Text, 27, The Uncompromising Gatekeeper
The deep shaft
Bilac looks around, picks up a piece of metal, and drops it down the shaft.
Pencilgon and Katzo smile like foxes.
He runs
Katzo catches him with a whip.
He kneels on the ground, sweating.
He removes the whip
A rope wraps around rubble. More ropes are tied together. Katzo climbs down into the shaft.
The rest of the party look down the shaft.
Katzo looks down and lets go. She lands in a metal hallway lit by a line of glowing panels.
Katzo stares at a door in the hallway.
She steps forward, over a red line.
A tube descends and opens. A white robot with an extra set of black arms drops down.
He equips his rapier.
He shoots a beam of light. The robot holds up an arm.
The beam makes contact in a flash of brilliant light and a blue and purple explosion.
The explosion dissipates. The robots arms glow with a blue force field.
She equips a gold spear.
Katzo puts her fists together. Sunraku equips moon blades.
Text, Clan Wolfgang
The attack ripples behind the robot, striking it.
The robot holds its black arms which glow and shoot lasers. Sunraku dodges while wall running.
Bilac and Katzo fly at the robot.
They both strike. The robots blocks.
Sunraku lands next to the door.
The robot fires lasers back at him
Katzo slides back, then runs
Katzo and Bilac press their attacks.
Amariys steps. The robot looks up.
Seen from 3 angles, their attack fires simultaneously, striking the robot.
The robot's torso cracks.
Katzo and Bilac land beside the robot.
Pencilgon spins her spear.
She throws the spear through the robot's chest.
It falls back
Sunraku, Katzo, and Bilac descend on the robot.
The robot dissipates.
Pencilgon looks at her spear.
A panel glows red, crackles, then fades.
Text, Ruin sense, appraise ruins and unlock how they work
The panel glows green
The door opens
They stare at a large laboratory, with various objects, robots, and tanks of fluid.
Katzo strangles Sunraku
Pencilgon looks at crates and cabinets
Bilac looks under a table.
Katzo holds a small box.
Amariys tries to climb onto a counter.
Sunraku walks
He presses a button
She sports a metal donut hat
She looks at Emul
The donut hat
Pencilgon and Katzo exchange glances.
Pencilgon and Katzo place their hands on Sunraku's shoulder.
He twitches.
Outside, in the ruins, Sunraku walks, his torso bound by Katzo's whip.
She furrows her brow.
She kicks him.
Eighthold
Pencilgon side eyes Sunraku, wearing his ghost garb.
An alleyway. Pencilgon and Katzo stand behind Sunraku, smiling like foxes. Bilac and an injured Amariys look at them.
She closes the door on the already injured Amariys. He slides through, and the door disappears.
Katzo nods.
On the main road, someone approaches.
On the main road, someone approaches. Pencilgon and Katzo smile. Sunraku turns.
Animalia
Her eyes glow red and she stares intently
Animalia runs forward, as if possessed by a demon.
SF Zoo approaches. Sunraku prepares to run.
Text, 32, OiKatzo's Five-Second Answers
A spotlight shines on Katzo, sitting in a chair. Text, What's your playstyle in a game?
Did you know "acqua pazza" means "crazy water"?
What do you think of Sunraku-san?
What do you think about Pencilgon-san?
Do you know the difference between bouillabaisse and acqua pazza?
Give us the most side-splitting monk-related joke you can.
5 points
